heading: beanie brouhaha
subheading: a las vegas judge has resolved a divorced couple's bickering over their beanie baby collection by ordering the couple to split the stuffed toys up, one by one, in the courtroom. as spectators in the gallery sniggered, frances mountain and her ex-husband squatted on the courtroom floor among piles of the popular plush critters to divvy up the litter -- worth more than us$2,500. ms. mountain called it ridiculous and embarrassing. but clearly king solomon would have approved.
author: wired staff
text: a las vegas judge has resolved a divorced couple's bickering over their beanie baby collection by ordering the couple to split the stuffed toys up, one by one, in the courtroom. as spectators in the gallery sniggered, frances mountain and her ex-husband squatted on the courtroom floor among piles of the popular plush critters to divvy up the litter -- worth more than us$2,500. ms. mountain called it ridiculous and embarrassing. but clearly king solomon would have approved.
